text: It would be nice to be able to clone blogs and clone posts to other blogs.
Blog development is generally a lot slower because we have to populate a test blog to see our template in action.
It would also be nice if we could stage blogs
Idea: Assign user roles with default (but customizable) permissions on an HS site–e.g. marketer (gets email, blog, webpage permissions), developer (design manager + aforementioned) and so on…
Idea: Include a checkbox in the form module that allows for removing default CSS like you can with the embed option.
Idea: based on <@U25C6PU56>'s question, can we add in the consent of the contacts with GDPR values to their contact record in the Developer Info panel as well as the contact record via API?
Refuse cookies, get cookie saying you refused.
